extensionDescription_v1.message: Firefox Relay rende facile crear aliases de e-mail que inultra a tu real cassa de ingresso.
extensionDescription_v1.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

extensionDescription_mask.message: Firefox Relay rende facile crear mascas email que inultra a tu real cassa de ingresso.
extensionDescription_mask.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

extensionDescriptionStore.message: Firefox Relay te adjuta a proteger tu real adresse e-mail, le major parte del los intimemente ligate a tu identitate online. Illo te permitte de generar unic, aliases aleatori que tu pote usar pro inscriber te a contos, apps, o bulletines de novas, e inultra messages a tu real adresse. Si tu trova que un conto invia indesirate e-mail o SPAM, tu pote blocar le alias e illo stoppara le invio de e-mail a tu cassa de ingresso. Un vice tu non plus vole un conto, tu pote deler le alias.
extensionDescriptionStore.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

labelRelayPremium.description: Alt text for the premium Relay logo. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay Premium".

firstRunP.message: Tu ha installate con successo le additivo Firefox Relay. Pro comenciar, accede a Relay con tu Firefox Account.
firstRunP.description: First sentence on the first run page after installing the add-on. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay", "Relay", or "Firefox".

firstRunCollectDataLabel.message: Permitter a Mozilla de colliger informationes re como tu usa iste extension.
firstRunCollectDataLabel.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we show a toggle and ask the user if the add-on can send interaction data to Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla".

allowDataCollection.description: The label on the toggle that ALLOWS sending interaction data to Mozilla.

disableDataCollection.description: The label on the toggle that DISABLES sending interaction data to Mozilla.

firstRunPrefP.message: Colliger datos de interaction quando tu face cosas como cliccar le icone de Relay in tu barra del instrumentos o crear un nove alias adjuta nos a apprender lo que functiona ben e ubi nos pote meliorar. Tu pote sempre disactivar isto in le quadro del parametros.
firstRunPrefP.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we tell the user how interaction data helps Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

firstRunPrefP_mask.message: Colliger datos de interaction quando tu face cosas como cliccar le icone de Relay in tu barra del instrumentos o crear un nove masca adjuta nos a apprender lo que functiona ben e ubi nos pote meliorar. Tu pote sempre disactivar isto in le quadro del parametros.
firstRunPrefP_mask.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we tell the user how interaction data helps Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

popupSettingsShowIcon.message: Monstrar icone de Relay in campos de e-mail sur sitos web
popupSettingsShowIcon.description: In the settings panel, we display a toggle so the user can enable or disable the Relay icon in websites. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

popupSettingsCollectData.message: Permitter a Mozilla de colliger datos de interaction
popupSettingsCollectData.description: The label on the toggle that ENABLES sending interaction data to Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla".

popupSignUpPanelIntro.message: Comencia per acceder a Relay con tu Firefox Account.
popupSignUpPanelIntro.description: In the pop-up panel, before the user has signed in, we invite to them sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay", OR "Firefox".

popupRemainingAliases_2.description: Tells the user how many more aliases they can make.

popupRemainingAliases_2_mask.description: Tells the user how many more masks they can make.

popupRemainingFreeMasks.description: Tells the user how many more free masks they can make.

popupRecentlyUsedMasks.description: Label for list of most recently used masks.

popupUnlimitedAliases.description: Tells the premium user how many aliases they have created.

popupUnlimitedAliases_mask.description: Tells the premium user how many masks they have created.

labelFromThisWebsite.description: In the pop-up panel, the use can view masks only created or used on a certain website.

labelAllEmailMasks.description: In the pop-up panel, the use can view all masks they've created.

popupOnboardingMaxAliasesPanelBody.message: Tu es un usator de potentia de Firefox Relay!
popupOnboardingMaxAliasesPanelBody.description: In the pop-up panel, when a free user has hit their mask limit, we tell them they're a power-user. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

popupRegisterDomainHeadline.message: Obtene un dominio personal pro le aliases de e-mail de Relay

popupRegisterDomainHeadline_mask.message: Obtene un subdominio personal pro le mascas email de Relay

popupUpgradeToPremiumBanner.message: Promove a Relay Premium pro major protection!

popupEducationalComponent1Body.message: Relay pote adjutar a proteger tu e-mail non importa ubi tu es.

popupAttachmentSizeIncreaseBody.message: Firefox Relay pote ora inultrar e-mails usque 25MB, includite annexos.

popupCriticalEmailForwardingBody.message: Relay Premium te permitte de reciper solo e-mails critic inviate a un alias. Tu recipera e-mails tal como quitantias, ma non e-mails de marketing.

popupCriticalEmailForwardingBody_mask.message: Relay Premium te permitte de reciper solo emails critic inviate a un masca. Tu recipera emails como quitantias, ma non emails de marketing.

popupBlockPromotionalEmailsBody.message: Activar le blocada del e-mails promotional sur un alias pro stoppar le e-mails de marketing de attinger tu cassa de ingresso.

popupBlockPromotionalEmailsBody_mask.message: Activar le blocada de emails promotional sur un masca pro stoppar emails de marketing que attinge tu cassa de ingresso.

popupBlockPromotionalEmailsBodyNonPremiu.message: Con Relay Premium, tu pote blocar e-mails promotional de attinger tu cassa de ingresso durante que ancora te es permittite reciper e-mails como quitantias o informationes de expedition.

popupSignBackInBody.message: Pro crear un nove alias quando te es requirite tu e-mail, aperi le menu contextual (clic dextre o control + clic) in un campo email. De illac tu pote crear e usar un nove alias immediatemente.

pageInputIconSignUpText.message: Visita le sito web de Firefox Relay pro acceder o crear un conto.
pageInputIconSignUpText.description: In the website content icon pop-up, before a user has signed in, we tell them to sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

pageInputIconSignUpButton.description: In the website content icon pop-up, before a user has signed in, we tell them to sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

pageInputIconUseExistingAliasFromTheSite.message: Usar alias existente ab iste sitoâ€¦

pageInputIconMaxAliasesError.message: Tu ha jam create le maxime numero de aliases
pageInputIconMaxAliasesError.description: Tells the user they have already created the max number of aliases.

pageFillRelayAddressLimit.message: Tu ha attingite le limite de alias.

profilePageInvalidAliasCharactersError.description: Error message that appears when the user tries to use special characters when labelling an mask.

profilePageDefaulAliasLabelText.description: On the user's profile page, this text appears for a mask when it doesn't have a label.

popupDataCollectionBody.message: Tu pote permitter a Relay de colliger datos optional pro nos consentir de synchronisar tu etiquettas alias inter apparatos con le sitos web ubi illos ha essite create e es usate.

popupPrivacyNoticeUpdateBody.message: Pro meliorar le fidabilitate de Firefox Relay in caso que un e-mail non pote esser livrate, nos temporarimente mantenera le e-mail sur nostre servitores usque illo ha essite livrate. Nos jammais lo tenera illac plus que tres dies.
